current_company.title: Sr. Analyst @ American Express | Data | Strategy | Fraud Risk Management | IIT Kharagpur

positions.subtitle: American Express
positions.description: *Lead multiple high impact migration workstreams of fraud risk management capabilities*Develop detailed understanding of POD systems and create requirements for POA*Validate POA systems for migration readiness to support existing systems*Collaborate with stakeholders across product, technology and strategy teams*Support migration of analytical workloads to Google Cloud Platform
positions.title: Senior Analyst
positions.description_html:
*Lead multiple high impact migration workstreams of fraud risk management capabilities
*Develop detailed understanding of POD systems and create requirements for POA
*Validate POA systems for migration readiness to support existing systems
*Collaborate with stakeholders across product, technology and strategy teams
*Support migration of analytical workloads to Google Cloud Platform

positions.subtitle: American Express
positions.description: *Big-Data driven risk management of point-of-sale fraud by designing strategy controls and decision science ideas*Portfolio tracking by leveraging MIS reports and analytical deep dives.*Customer centric review of fraud cases by analysing transaction level data and deriving insights from call recordings*Supporting Enterprise-Wide Technology Migration initiatives*EVP Star awardee, Q1 2024
positions.title: Analyst Risk and Info Management
positions.description_html:
*Big-Data driven risk management of point-of-sale fraud by designing strategy controls and decision science ideas
*Portfolio tracking by leveraging MIS reports and analytical deep dives.
*Customer centric review of fraud cases by analysing transaction level data and deriving insights from call recordings
*Supporting Enterprise-Wide Technology Migration initiatives
*EVP Star awardee, Q1 2024
